name: Moondance Boutique Resort

reviews.title: Our favourite stay in China
reviews.text: We decided hands down that this was our favourite hotel stay during our 3 week trip.

reviews.title: Best Boutique Resort in China
reviews.text: The resort is located in Fenglou Village facing the Jinbao River. Fenglou appears on all the tourist maps you get (in Chinese so you should get it circled). It is a 30 rmb taxi ride into Yangshuo, although I can't understand why you would want to - if you are going to Yangshuo for the karst scenery, cycling, to relax and soak up some rural culture, this is definitely the place to go. We were only in Yangshuo town once after our rAft ride and had no desire to see it again when we could enjoy the surrounding countryside at our hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service is impeccable. In fact, I felt slightly ashamed afterwards that I gave up trying to speak mandarin as the staff's English were all good! They were lovely people and went out of their way to arrange things to make our trip more enjoyable and easier for us. They seem to have a good network of contacts such as taxi drivers.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel

reviews.text: We were very happy with the facilities. Free wifi is provided. What was outstanding was the commitment to keep prices reasonable when potentially, since you have to travel into Yangshuo and the convenient option being to dine there, could try to overcharge. Food was delicious (we ate there every night) and drinks very reasonable. Bike hire is free!
reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful

reviews.text: We were in room 303 - Starry Night which was perfect. The bathtub really is something else! All the rooms are named after songs (Stairway to Heaven, Moondance, Eternal Flame...) which was a nice touch! I meant to ask Roland, but what song is Starry Night? Isn't it called "Vincent"?
reviews.title: A peaceful retreat

reviews.text: The Moondance is perfectly situated on the banks of one of the Li River tributaries with gorgeous views of the surrounding karst mountains and Moon Hill. Our room was beautiful and spacious. I arrived sick and the only thing I could eat was yogurt and toast, which was disappointing because my family said all of the food was delicious. Moondance's caring and helpful staff were exceptional. They organized a tour guide, Farmer Tang to take us to the rice terraces. He was wonderful. Even though I was sick and my Mom was having a difficult time with the climb Farmer Tang was patient and so kind the entire time. Lynn (who speaks excellent english), Sam (who was so sweet and always smiling), Emily, Millie and Amy (who were all so attentive to our every need), and Jennifer and Roland were all perfect hosts, who made us feel like family. We will miss each of them. We couldn't be happier with our stay.
reviews.title: Beautiful Boutique Hotel
Highly Recommended
reviews.text: We really enjoyed our stay here! We loved the location, the rooms and the service. Previous posts have pretty much said it all - and I concur with them all. We enjoyed sitting out on the deck beside the river to watch the farmers and their water buffalow etc going home. Our room was very nice with a huge balcony and fantastic bathroom. They had push bikes (free) that we used to ride through some of the countryside and including Moon Hill. Quite a hike up the hill!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We used Amy as a guide during some of our stay here and I would highly recommend her too!!!
reviews.title: Awesome, great, terrific what else can I say...

reviews.text: We were there in April...Roland was there the first night we arrived...he made us feel right at home...Lynn spoke great english and helped us arrange all of our outings....Thank you LYNN...the bamboo river trip was our favorite...we went to the smaller river, great choice...Our rooms were on the second floor with great views...(no elevators) but helpful staff....the bathroom exceeded our expectations, hugh shower...
reviews.title: Simply perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food was very good...and I am a picky eater....
reviews.title: What can I say that had not been said already

reviews.text: This 12-room hotel is "as good as your gonna get in Guangxi Province", rivals big city Western hotels for amenities! Just stayed 4 nights, and so glad I chose Moondance for the following reasons:
reviews.title: As Good As It is Going to Get

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1) Downtown Yangshuo is Honky Tonk Junk and Noisy and Cluttered with too many people, motorbikes, bicycles, cars, buses. So much better to stay in the country 8km outside of the center of town and take 30-40 RMB ($7) taxi in and out of Yangshuo. Actually, I went in for one 2-hour spell at night, and that was enough of the honky-tonk
reviews.title: Excellent boutique hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2) This is modern boutique hotel, run by Ex-Pat Dutch Roland and his wife (and others). His staff of local Chinese are wonderful, and so accommodating, speaking English just fine. Rooms have AC, Hot Water heater and coffee/tea (I work early in morning, need coffee); Wifi at OK/decent speed (not big city speed, but good enough); Modern spacious bathroom with modern sinks, showers, toilets. All impeccably clean.
reviews.title: Lovely stay in Yangshuo

reviews.text: 3) Located along side a river, with manicured gardens / lawns / shaded tables and chairs are set up for lounging and/or eating outdoors or on open veranda
reviews.title: Great place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 4) Repeating again, clean, modern
reviews.title: The place to go to unwind and relax.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed there for 2 nights and we loved it!!!
reviews.title: excellent hotel
100% fantastic!! First class everything!!
reviews.text: Perfect setting, nice staff, free bikes available, excellent value for money,..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Roland, you and the staff are amazing! We felt like family!! The food was terrific and it was like having our own chef cooking our favorite foods. How I loved that eggplant dish.
reviews.title: A wonderful small inn

reviews.text: We enjoyed 4 nights in the family room, 101 in March. Also great as it is on the ground floor, so no steps to the room. Although the weather was cool and dull, the airconditioning kept the room very comfortable.
reviews.title: Perfect mini getaway location

reviews.text: We also recommend jack from jack,s private tours, as a guide.
reviews.title: Great hotel, location excellent, staff fantastic.

description: With twelve large, all non-identical suites with modern private bathroom, Moondance has the perfect suite for each traveler. Enjoy your coffee on the private balcony, take a bath with tremendous views of the surroundings, read a book in your lounge corner and rest like Sleeping Beauty in our self-made King-Size bed.
